short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click on an image to save as JPG

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Saver - Quick JPG Download
Effortlessly save images from any webpage with a simple right-click! Image Saver is a sleek, user-friendly Chrome extension that allows you to download images as JPGs instantly and keep track of all your downloads.

Features
Easy Right-Click Save: Just right-click on any image, choose "Save Image as JPG," and it's done!
Download Log: Access your download history with a click. Each entry shows a preview, filename, and download time.
One-Click Re-download: Missed an image? Just click on any log entry to download it again!
Clean, Modern Design: Enjoy a polished, streamlined interface with hover effects and a smooth user experience.
Why Choose Image Saver?
Perfect for users who frequently save images, Image Saver combines simplicity and style, making it quick and hassle-free to manage your image downloads.

Get Image Saver now and enjoy a seamless image-saving experience!
